member.name: T:System.Data.HashFunction.Utilities.IntegerManipulation.ReflectBitsExtensions
member.summary: Static class to provide ReflectBits extension functions.

member.name: M:System.Data.HashFunction.Utilities.IntegerManipulation.ReflectBitsExtensions.ReflectBits(System.Byte,System.Int32)
member.summary: Reflects the low-order bits of an integer.
member.param: Number of low-order bits to reflect.
member.returns: New integer whose low-order bitLength number of bits have been reflected.
member.remarks: Any non-included high orders bits will be zeroed out in the returned integer.
member.exception: bitLength;bitLength must be in the range [1, 8].

member.name: M:System.Data.HashFunction.Utilities.IntegerManipulation.ReflectBitsExtensions.ReflectBits(System.UInt16,System.Int32)
member.exception: bitLength;bitLength must be in the range [1, 16].

member.name: M:System.Data.HashFunction.Utilities.IntegerManipulation.ReflectBitsExtensions.ReflectBits(System.UInt32,System.Int32)
member.exception: bitLength;bitLength must be in the range [1, 32]

member.name: M:System.Data.HashFunction.Utilities.IntegerManipulation.ReflectBitsExtensions.ReflectBits(System.UInt64,System.Int32)
member.exception: bitLength;bitLength must be in the range [1, 64]

member.name: T:System.Data.HashFunction.Utilities.IntegerManipulation.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: Contains extension functions for manipulating integer to be shared only within Data.HashFunction.* assemblies.

member.name: T:System.Data.HashFunction.Utilities.IntegerManipulation.ToBytesExtensions
member.summary: Static class to provide ToBytes extension functions.

member.name: M:System.Data.HashFunction.Utilities.IntegerManipulation.ToBytesExtensions.ToBytes(System.Byte,System.Int32)
member.summary: Converts integer to the smallest byte array that will fit the integers low-order bitLength bits.
member.param: The value to convert to bytes.
Number of bits to use from the provided value.
member.returns: An smallest possible array of bytes that contains all of the low-order bitLength bits.
member.remarks: Any extra high-order bits in the last byte are guaranteed to be zero.
member.exception: bitLength;bitLength but be in the range [1, 8].

member.name: M:System.Data.HashFunction.Utilities.IntegerManipulation.ToBytesExtensions.ToBytes(System.UInt16,System.Int32)
member.exception: bitLength;bitLength but be in the range [1, 16].

member.name: M:System.Data.HashFunction.Utilities.IntegerManipulation.ToBytesExtensions.ToBytes(System.UInt32,System.Int32)
member.exception: bitLength;bitLength but be in the range [1, 32].

member.name: M:System.Data.HashFunction.Utilities.IntegerManipulation.ToBytesExtensions.ToBytes(System.UInt64,System.Int32)
member.exception: bitLength;bitLength but be in the range [1, 64].

member.name: T:System.Data.HashFunction.Utilities.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: Contains extension functions to be shared only within Data.HashFunction.* assemblies.

member.name: T:System.Data.HashFunction.Utilities.IntegerManipulation.ExtendedMultiplyExtensions
member.summary: Static class to provide ExtendedMultiply extension functions.

member.name: M:System.Data.HashFunction.Utilities.IntegerManipulation.ExtendedMultiplyExtensions.ExtendedMultiply(System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyList{System.UInt32},System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyList{System.UInt32})
member.summary: Multiplies operand1 by operand2 as if both operand1 and operand2 were single large integers.
member.param: Array of UInt32 values to be multiplied.
Array of UInt32 values to multiply by.

member.name: T:System.Data.HashFunction.Utilities.IntegerManipulation.RotateRightExtensions
member.summary: Static class to provide RotateRight extension functions.

member.name: M:System.Data.HashFunction.Utilities.IntegerManipulation.RotateRightExtensions.RotateRight(System.Byte,System.Int32)
member.summary: Rotate bits of integer right by specified amount.
member.param: 8-bit integer that will have its bits rotated right.
Number of bits to shift the integer by.
member.returns: Resulting 8-bit integer after rotating the operand integer's bits by the amount specified by the shiftCount parameter.
member.remarks: The shift count is given by the low-order three bits of the shiftCount parameter. That is, the actual shift count is 0 to 7 bits.

member.name: M:System.Data.HashFunction.Utilities.IntegerManipulation.RotateRightExtensions.RotateRight(System.UInt16,System.Int32)
member.summary: Rotate bits of integer right by specified amount.
member.param: 16-bit integer that will have its bits rotated right.
Number of bits to shift the integer by.
member.returns: Resulting 16-bit integer after rotating the operand integer's bits by the amount specified by the shiftCount parameter.
member.remarks: The shift count is given by the low-order four bits of the shiftCount parameter. That is, the actual shift count is 0 to 15 bits.

member.name: M:System.Data.HashFunction.Utilities.IntegerManipulation.RotateRightExtensions.RotateRight(System.UInt32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Rotate bits of integer right by specified amount.
member.param: 32-bit integer that will have its bits rotated right.
Number of bits to shift the integer by.
member.returns: Resulting 32-bit integer after rotating the operand integer's bits by the amount specified by the shiftCount parameter.
member.remarks: The shift count is given by the low-order five bits of the shiftCount parameter. That is, the actual shift count is 0 to 31 bits.

member.name: M:System.Data.HashFunction.Utilities.IntegerManipulation.RotateRightExtensions.RotateRight(System.UInt64,System.Int32)
member.summary: Rotate bits of integer right by specified amount.
member.param: 64-bit integer that will have its bits rotated right.
Number of bits to shift the integer by.
member.returns: Resulting 64-bit integer after rotating the operand integer's bits by the amount specified by the shiftCount parameter.
member.remarks: The shift count is given by the low-order six bits of the shiftCount parameter. That is, the actual shift count is 0 to 63 bits.

member.name: T:System.Data.HashFunction.Utilities.IntegerManipulation.RotateLeftExtensions
member.summary: Static class to provide RotateLeft extension functions.

member.returns: Resulting 8-bit integer after rotating the operand integer's bits by the amount specified by the shiftCount parameter.
member.remarks: The shift count is given by the low-order three bits of the shiftCount parameter. That is, the actual shift count is 0 to 7 bits.

member.name: M:System.Data.HashFunction.Utilities.IntegerManipulation.RotateLeftExtensions.RotateLeft(System.UInt16,System.Int32)
member.summary: Rotate bits of integer left by specified amount.
member.param: 16-bit integer that will have its bits rotated left.
Number of bits to shift the integer by.
member.returns: Resulting 16-bit integer after rotating the operand integer's bits by the amount specified by the shiftCount parameter.
member.remarks: The shift count is given by the low-order four bits of the shiftCount parameter. That is, the actual shift count is 0 to 15 bits.

member.summary: Rotate bits of integer left by specified amount.
member.param: 32-bit integer that will have its bits rotated left.
Number of bits to shift the integer by.
member.returns: Resulting 32-bit integer after rotating the operand integer's bits by the amount specified by the shiftCount parameter.
member.remarks: The shift count is given by the low-order five bits of the shiftCount parameter. That is, the actual shift count is 0 to 31 bits.

member.summary: Rotate bits of integer left by specified amount.

Number of bits to shift the integer by.

member.remarks: The shift count is given by the low-order six bits of the shiftCount parameter. That is, the actual shift count is 0 to 63 bits.

A signed number indicating the relative values of this instance and .

member.returns: Bytes representing the UInt32 array.

member.summary: Static class to provide BigInteger extension functions.

member.name: M:System.Data.HashFunction.Utilities.BigIntegerExtensions.ToUInt32Array(System.Numerics.BigInteger,System.Int32)
member.summary: Converts a BigInteger to an array of UInt32 values.
member.param: Expected bit-length of resulting array. Must be a positive multiple of 32.
member.returns: Array of UInt32 values representing the BigInteger value.
member.exception: bitSize;bitSize must be a positive a multiple of 32.

member.name: T:System.Data.HashFunction.Utilities.UnifiedData.UnifiedData
member.summary: Centralized methodology for accessing data used by Data.HashFunction.

member.name: M:System.Data.HashFunction.Utilities.UnifiedData.UnifiedData.ForEachRead(System.Action{System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32})
member.summary: Executes an action each time a chunk is read.

member.name: M:System.Data.HashFunction.Utilities.UnifiedData.UnifiedData.ForEachReadAsync(System.Action{System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32})
member.returns: Task representing the asynchronous operation.

member.name: M:System.Data.HashFunction.Utilities.UnifiedData.UnifiedData.ForEachGroup(System.Int32,System.Action{System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32},System.Action{System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32})
member.summary: Executes an action one or more times, providing the data read as an array whose length is a multiple of groupSize. Optionally runs an action on the final remainder group.
member.param: Length of the groups passed to the action.
Action to execute for each full group read.
Action to execute if the final group is less than groupSize. Null values are allowed.
member.remarks: remainderAction will not be run if the length of the data is a multiple of groupSize.

member.name: M:System.Data.HashFunction.Utilities.UnifiedData.UnifiedData.ForEachGroupAsync(System.Int32,System.Action{System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32},System.Action{System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32})
member.returns: Task representing the asynchronous operation.

member.name: M:System.Data.HashFunction.Utilities.UnifiedData.UnifiedData.ToArray
member.summary: Reads all data and converts it to an in-memory array.
member.returns: Array of bytes read from the data provider.

member.name: P:System.Data.HashFunction.Utilities.UnifiedData.UnifiedData.Length
member.summary: Length of data provided.
member.remarks: Implementors are allowed throw an exception if it is not possible to resolve the length of the data.

member.name: P:System.Data.HashFunction.Utilities.UnifiedData.UnifiedData.BufferSize
member.summary: Length of temporary buffers used, if they are needed.
member.remarks: Implementors are not required to use this value.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Contains a centralized methodology for accessing data used by Data.HashFunction both synchronously and asynchronously.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
